sentence.Network_en: He was a small and to all appearances an unassuming man.
sentence.Network_cn: 他个子小，看上去不事张扬。

sentence.Network_en: His parents' obsession with keeping up appearances haunted his childhood.
sentence.Network_cn: 父母过于爱面子的做法在他儿时一直困扰着他。

sentence.Network_en: Keegan made 68 appearances in two seasons for Southampton, scoring 37 times.
sentence.Network_cn: 基冈为南安普敦队踢了两个赛季，共上场68次，进球37个。

PerfectNetExp.abs: walden books has canceled the rest of your appearances ., 沃顿书局已经取消了你剩下的见面会.

a teenager's naive ignorance of life ; the naive assumption that things can only get better ; this naive simple creature with wide friendly eyes so eager to believe appearances .天真少年对生活的无知；天真的假象是事情只往好的方面发展；这个天真的小家伙，友善率直的眼睛如此轻易相信表面现象。

list.abs: 大英语B级词汇表 - 豆丁网 ... appear vi. 出现,看来 appearance n. 出现,外貌 appetite n. 胃口,欲望.
2013年高考英语词汇表 - 豆丁网 ... appear vi. 出现 appearance n. 出现，露面； 容貌 appendix n. 附录，阑尾.
词汇竞赛 - 中国习网 ... Disappear 消失 Appear 出现 Impolite 无礼貌的.
2012英语四级词汇复习资料_百度文库 ... appeal vi.&n. 呼吁；申述 appear vi. 出现；来到；似乎 appearance n. 出现，来到；外观.

entry.def: When someone makes an appearance at a public event or in a broadcast, they take part in it.

example.ex: It was the president's second public appearance to date...
example.tran: 这是总统到那时为止的第二次公开露面。

example.ex: Keegan made 68 appearances in two seasons for Southampton, scoring 37 times.
example.tran: 基冈为南安普敦队踢了两个赛季，共上场68次，进球37个。

entry.def: Someone's or something's appearance is the way that they look.

example.ex: She used to be so fussy about her appearance...
example.tran: 她过去非常在意自己的容貌。

example.ex: He had the appearance of a college student...
example.tran: 他的模样就像个大学生。

entry.def: The appearance of someone or something in a place is their arrival there, especially when it is unexpected.

example.ex: The sudden appearance of a few bags of rice could start a riot.
example.tran: 突然出现几袋大米可能会引起骚乱。

example.ex: ...last Christmas, when there'd been the welcome appearance of Cousin Fred.
example.tran: 去年圣诞，堂兄弗雷德的现身受到热烈欢迎。

entry.def: The appearance of something new is its coming into existence or use.

example.ex: Flowering plants were making their first appearance, but were still a rarity...
example.tran: 显花植物开始出现了，但仍然很少。

example.ex: Fears are growing of a cholera outbreak following the appearance of a number of cases in the city.
example.tran: 该市出现几起霍乱病例之后，人们对霍乱爆发的恐惧越来越强烈。

entry.def: If something has the appearance of a quality, it seems to have that quality.

example.ex: We tried to meet both children's needs without the appearance of favoritism or unfairness...
example.tran: 我们尽力对两个孩子的需要都予以满足，而不显得有所偏向或袒护。

example.ex: The US president risked giving the appearance that the US was taking sides.
example.tran: 美国总统冒险作出美国正在摆明立场的姿态。

entry.def: If something is true to all appearances ,from all appearances, or by all appearances, it seems from what you observe or know about it that it is true.

example.ex: He was a small and to all appearances an unassuming man.
example.tran: 他个子小，看上去不事张扬。

entry.tran: 装样子；撑场面；打肿脸充胖子
entry.def: If you keep up appearances, you try to behave and dress in a way that people expect of you, even if you can no longer afford it.

example.ex: His parents' obsession with keeping up appearances haunted his childhood.
example.tran: 父母过于爱面子的做法在他儿时一直困扰着他。

entry.tran: 露一下面;到场稍作停留
entry.def: If you put in an appearance at an event, you go to it for a short time although you may not really want to, but do not stay.

example.ex: You must put in an appearance, at least, or she'll think you're avoiding her.
example.tran: 至少，你必须露一下面，否则她会认为你在躲避她。

auth_sentence.content: For her, it was much for keeping appearances.
auth_sentence.res_content: For her, it was much for keeping appearances.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: For her, it was much for keeping appearances.

auth_sentence.content: To all appearances, it was a pointless misdemeanor.
auth_sentence.res_content: To all appearances, it was a pointless misdemeanor.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: To all appearances, it was a pointless misdemeanor.

auth_sentence.content: She has not made any public appearances since then.
auth_sentence.res_content: She has not made any public appearances since then.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She has not made any public appearances since then.
